name: floecat.core.cache.accounts
description: Number of accounts with an active cache entry, tagged by cache name.

name: floecat.core.cache.enabled
description: Indicator that the cache is enabled (1=enabled, 0=disabled).

name: floecat.core.cache.entries
description: Approximate number of entries in the cache, tagged by cache name.

name: floecat.core.cache.errors
description: Number of cache operation failures (load errors), tagged by cache name.

name: floecat.core.cache.hits
description: Number of cache lookup hits, tagged by cache name.

name: floecat.core.cache.latency
description: Cache latency distribution for operations.

name: floecat.core.cache.max.entries
description: Configured max entries for the cache.

name: floecat.core.cache.max.weight.bytes
description: Configured maximum weight (bytes) for the cache.

name: floecat.core.cache.misses
description: Number of cache lookup misses, tagged by cache name.

name: floecat.core.cache.weighted.size.bytes
description: Total weight (bytes) of cache entries, tagged by cache name.

name: floecat.core.exec.active
description: Number of threads actively executing tasks per pool.

name: floecat.core.exec.queue.depth
description: Number of work items waiting in the executor queue per pool.

name: floecat.core.exec.rejected
description: Number of task submissions rejected by the executor.

name: floecat.core.exec.task.run
description: Duration spent running the task on a worker thread.

name: floecat.core.exec.task.wait
description: Duration spent waiting in the queue before execution starts.

name: floecat.core.gc.collections
description: Number of GC collections per GC type.

name: floecat.core.gc.errors
description: GC failures per GC type.

name: floecat.core.gc.pause
description: GC pause time per GC type.

name: floecat.core.gc.retries
description: GC retries per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.observability.dropped.metric.total
description: Total number of metric emissions rejected because validation failed.

name: floecat.core.observability.dropped.tags.total
description: Total number of tags dropped because they violated telemetry contracts.

name: floecat.core.observability.duplicate.gauge.total
description: Count of duplicate gauges that strict mode detected.

name: floecat.core.observability.invalid.metric.total
description: Total number of metrics rejected because they were not registered.

name: floecat.core.observability.registry.size
description: Current size of the telemetry registry.

name: floecat.core.rpc.active
description: Number of in-flight RPCs per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.rpc.errors
description: Count of RPC failures per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.rpc.latency
description: Latency distribution for RPC operations.

name: floecat.core.rpc.requests
description: Total RPC requests processed, tagged by account and status.

name: floecat.core.rpc.retries
description: Number of RPC retries invoked.

name: floecat.core.store.bytes
description: Count of bytes processed by store operations.

name: floecat.core.store.errors
description: Store failure count per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.store.latency
description: Store operation latency distribution.

name: floecat.core.store.requests
description: Number of store requests emitted per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.store.retries
description: Store retries per component/operation.

name: floecat.core.task.enabled
description: Indicator that a scheduled task is enabled (1=enabled, 0=disabled).

name: floecat.core.task.last.tick.end.ms
description: Timestamp (ms since epoch) when the scheduled task last finished a tick.

name: floecat.core.task.last.tick.start.ms
description: Timestamp (ms since epoch) when the scheduled task last started a tick.

name: floecat.core.task.running
description: Number of active ticks for the scheduled task (usually 0 or 1).

name: floecat.service.storage.account.bytes
description: Estimated per-account storage byte consumption (sampled, not exact).

name: floecat.service.storage.account.pointers
description: Per-account pointer count stored in the service.
